title: Pacesetter

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Content Sync- (Night) Target a player. The ability they use tonight is changed to a random ability from the same subalignment. They will know what ability it is changed to.
Step On It!- (Night) [Cheat] Select an amount of time from 12 to 24 hours. Until modified by a different ability or until your death, all Day Phases are this length.
Rush Job!- (Day) [Cheat] Select a player. Players will be informed that they were targeted for a Rush Job at the end of the Day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-You cannot Content Sync the same player two Nights in a row.
-Starting on Night 4, Step On It! can go down to 6 hours.
-If the player targeted by Rush Job! is not visited the next night, two random non-Cog who could have visited the Rush Job will be hit by an Astral Powerful Attack.
